item.title: I have a problem with this code
item.dc:creator: @startcode startcode
item.description:
@startcode wrote:

hi,

i’ve added a givesanta code to my server, and it works, but i only can give a santa to players who don’t have a space in there name.

Ex: i can give a santa to someone with the name: iownnow

but i can’t give a santa to someone with the name: i own now

this is my code:

}
else if (cmd[0].equals(“givesanta”) && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“owner”)) { if (cmd.length == 2) { Player victom = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(cmd[1])]; Engine.playerItems.addItem(victom, 1050, 1); }
}

how can i fix that?

help please

Read full topic
